name: micromamba
description: Installs micromamba, the fast cross-platform package manager.

version.description: Exact version of Micromamba to install, if not latest (must be X.Y.Z)

allowReinstall.description: Reinstall in case Micromamba already exists

channels.description: Space separated list of Conda channels to add

packages.description: Space separated list of packages to install. Should use with the 'channels' option.

envFile.description: Path of the an environment file (spec file) in the container. Referenced by the `micromamba create` command's `-f` option

envName.description: Should use with the 'envFile' option. Referenced by the `micromamba create` command's `-n` option
